column2: New unified build procedure in README.md (IJSDK-50)

column3: Combining the build instructions from intellij-community, intellij-sdk-docs, and jetbrains.org.
Changes will follow so that intellij-sdk-docs and jetbrains.org build instructions simply point at this page.

New commit incorporating your requested changes.
I kept stumbling over rephrasing this line in the original file: "If this git repository is not on 'master' branch you need to checkout the same branches/tags in android and android/tools-base git repositories."
Hopefully I've clarified the meaning in the new version. Let me know.

Looks good now, thank you!
I've merged your changes to 'master' branch, they will appear on github in an hour.
